text: [Va ej pajomʙar, ʙa jod ovar] hangome ki Parvardigorat ʙa faristagon vahj kard,ki: «Man ʙo sumo hastam, pas, kasonero, ki imon ovardaand, soʙitqadam dored. Ba zudi, dar dili kasone, ki kufr varzidand, haros meafkanam, pas. [ej mucohidon, samseri xesro] ʙar farozi gardanhojason ʙizaned va hamai angustonasonro qat' kuned [to siloh ʙarnagirand]
